content: the fisherman s cap is the hat of the year it s for skaters it s for the girlies it s for everyone who wants to look good it s a fairly easy pattern and it s great for beginners because it teaches you all the basic crochet stitches of single_crochet double_crochet half-double_crochet and the slip_stitch the full pattern is available on my youtube but this is the written pattern for anyone who wants to have a more polished version of it finished size is 8 20cm long and 22 56cm around materials needed are a 3 5mm hook or equivalent and around 250 metres of a light worsted weight yarn this is a pattern not a finished piece you will receive a pdf via email
